required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long--term Outcome Analysis of Fracture--related Infections
clinical_study.official_title: Long--term Outcome Analysis of Fracture--related Infections (Re_FRI)

brief_summary.textblock: This retrospective analysis of medical records is to identify risk factors for treatment failures in fracture-associated infections (FAI) at the University Hospital Basel.

primary_outcome.measure: number of flap failures at discharge from hospital
primary_outcome.description: number of flap failures at discharge from hospital

intervention.intervention_name: data collection from patients with FAI (occuring January 2000 until December 2019)
intervention.description: data collection from patient files (data regarding surgery, adverse events, infections, demographic data)

study_pop.textblock: Patients with FAI attending the University Hospital Basel from January 2000 until December 2019

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with FAI
Exclusion Criteria:
- documented denial of consent

overall_official.last_name: Dirk Johannes Schaefer, Prof. Dr. med.
overall_official.affiliation: Klinik für Plastische, Rekonstruktive, Ästhetische und Handchirurgie; University Hospital Basel

facility.name: Klinik für Plastische, Rekonstruktive, Ästhetische und Handchirurgie

results_reference.citation: Morgenstern M, Erichsen C, Militz M, Xie Z, Peng J, Stannard J, Metsemakers WJ, Schaefer D, Alt V, Søballe K, Nerlich M, Buckley RE, Blauth M, Suk M, Leung F, Barla JD, Yukata K, Qing B, Kates SL. The AO trauma CPP bone infection registry: Epidemiology and outcomes of Staphylococcus aureus bone infection. J Orthop Res. 2021 Jan;39(1):136-146. doi: 10.1002/jor.24804. Epub 2020 Jul 27.
